snippet: The state has suspended a Houston doctor’s license for performing abortions without having obtained local hospital admitting privileges.
abstract: Texas suspends license of Dr Theodore Herring of Houston for performing abortions without having obtained local hospital admitting privileges; action is first such move under new state abortion law that went into effect in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The state has suspended a Houston doctor’s license for performing abortions without having obtained local hospital admitting privileges.

headline.main: Texas: Houston Abortion Doctor Is First to Lose License Under New Law
headline.print_headline: Texas: Houston Abortion Doctor Is First to Lose License Under New Law
